mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, REGDATE, DELFLAG, SEX, BIRTH, EMAIL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SEQ) AS RN, SEQ, ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, REGDATE, DELFLAG, SEX, BIRTH, EMAIL FROM USERS ORDER BY DELFLAG, SEQ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{snum} AND #{cnum}

UPDATE USERS SET DELFLAG='Y' WHERE SEQ IN
#{seq}

SELECT REVIEW.SEQ, ID, CONTENT, REFER, STAR, DEPTH, STEP, RES_SEQ, REGDATE, REPORT, LIKEY, DISLIKEY, DELFLAG, R.SEQ, NAME, ADDR FROM REVIEW, ( SELECT RESLIST.SEQ, NAME, ADDR FROM REVIEW, RESLIST WHERE REVIEW.RES_SEQ = RESLIST.SEQ GROUP BY (RESLIST.SEQ, NAME, ADDR) ) R WHERE ADDR LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%' AND R.SEQ IN
#{seq}

SELECT REVIEW.SEQ, ID, CONTENT, REFER, STAR, DEPTH, STEP, RES_SEQ, REGDATE, REPORT, LIKEY, DISLIKEY, DELFLAG, R.SEQ, NAME, ADDR FROM REVIEW, ( SELECT RESLIST.SEQ, NAME, ADDR FROM REVIEW, RESLIST WHERE REVIEW.RES_SEQ = RESLIST.SEQ GROUP BY (RESLIST.SEQ, NAME, ADDR) ) R WHERE ADDR LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%' AND REVIEW.RES_SEQ = R.SEQ AND R.SEQ IN
#{seq}
SELECT RESLIST.SEQ, NAME, ADDR FROM REVIEW, RESLIST WHERE REVIEW.RES_SEQ = RESLIST.SEQ AND ADDR LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%' GROUP BY (RESLIST.SEQ, NAME, ADDR)

UPDATE REVIEW SET DELFLAG='Y' WHERE SEQ IN
#{seq}
SELECT SEQ, SI, GU FROM ADDRESS ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT SEQ, NAME, CATE, ADDR, 'CALL', 'START', 'END', REST_START, REST_END, PARKING, 'OPEN', CHK, 'COMMENT', X, Y FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SEQ) AS RN, SEQ, NAME, CATE, ADDR, 'CALL', 'START', 'END', REST_START, REST_END, PARKING, 'OPEN', CHK, 'COMMENT', X, Y FROM RESLIST WHERE CHK = 'N') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{snum} AND #{cnum}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10) CNT FROM RESLIST WHERE CHK='N'
UPDATE RESLIST SET CHK='Y', X=#{x}, Y=#{y} WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE RESLIST SET CHK='DEL' WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT SEQ, ID, PW, NAME, RES_SEQ, PHONE, RES_CALL, GRADE, EMAIL FROM ADMIN_OWNER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND SEQ = ${seq}
